snippet: The government will continue paying millions of South Africa's most vulnerable people social security payments on April 1, despite not signing a new deal with an existing service-provider, the minister of social development said on Sunday....

headline.main: Deadly Floods Hit Southern Zimbabwe, Destroying Many Homes
headline.print_headline: Deadly Floods Hit Southern Zimbabwe, Destroying Many Homes

lead_paragraph: The government will continue paying millions of South Africa's most vulnerable people social security payments on April 1, despite not signing a new deal with an existing service-provider, the minister of social development said on Sunday.
